title: 143. Why Bad Environmentalism Is Such an Easy Sell
description: Being green is rarely a black-and-white issue -- but that doesn't stop marketers and politicians from pretending it is.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
